course_details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including variables, loops, and functions. Suitable for beginners.
Master JavaScript for web development. Covers DOM manipulation, AJAX, and ES6 features.
Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python and popular libraries.
Get started with Java programming. Covers object-oriented concepts and basic Java syntax.
Become a full-stack web developer with hands-on experience in front-end and back-end technologies.
Advanced C++ programming techniques, including templates, STL, and memory management.
Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native. Covers UI development.
An introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms using Python.
Learn ethical hacking techniques and cybersecurity best practices.
